lead_paragraph: President Obama is stepping up his involvement in the fight to preserve the Democratic Party’s control of Congress, but he may avoid appearances in some competitive districts.
snippet: President Obama is stepping up his involvement in the fight to preserve the Democratic Party’s control of Congress, but he may avoid appearances in some competitive districts.

headline.print_headline: Obama to Offer Help From Afar In Fall Election
headline.main: To Help Democrats in the Fall, Obama May Stay Away
headline.seo: Obama Weighs Influence on Democrats’ Midterm Races
headline.sub: Identifying Districts to Visit and to Avoid ;
